item.title: Getting Started With Hugo
item.description: If you’d like to install Hugo and work with it on your own, and contribute to the webtext in that way, here are the links to the different tools and repositories that I am using: Hugo GitHub Repository Atom GitHub Desktop I will gladly work with anyone on working through how to use the tools.
